biography.bio: Furankî Sakai was born on February 13, 1929 in Kagoshima, Japan as Masatoshi Sakai. He was an actor and producer, known for Shogun (1980), Mothra (1961) and Sharaku (1995). He died on June 10, 1996.
biography.name: Furankî Sakai

biography.bio: Sumiko Minami is an actress, known for Gyûnyû ya Furankî (1956), Rajo to kenjû (1957) and OL nikki: Chigireta aiyoku (1974).
biography.name: Sumiko Minami

biography.bio: Harue Tone was born on November 15, 1924. She was an actress, known for Gyûnyû ya Furankî (1956), Desertion at Dawn (1950) and Gyakushu orochimaru (1955). She died on April 27, 2005 in Japan.
biography.name: Harue Tone

biography.bio: Toshiyuki Ichimura was born on December 20, 1920 in Tokyo, Japan as Seinosuke Ishikawa. He was an actor, known for Ikiru (1952), A Sun-Tribe Myth from the Bakumatsu Era (1957) and Gyûnyû ya Furankî (1956). He died on August 9, 1983.
biography.name: Toshiyuki Ichimura

biography.bio: Jô Shishido was born on December 6, 1933 in Osaka, Japan. He is an actor, known for Branded to Kill (1967), La barrière de chair (1964) and Youth of the Beast (1963).
biography.name: Jô Shishido

biography.bio: Kan Yanagiya is an actor, known for Stray Dog (1949), The Human Condition II: Road to Eternity (1959) and Travelling Actors (1940).
biography.name: Kan Yanagiya

biography.bio: Kunitarô Sawamura was born on June 1, 1905 in Asakusa, Tokyo, Japan as Tomoichi Katô. He was an actor, known for Sazen Tange and the Pot Worth a Million Ryo (1935), The Burmese Harp (1956) and Gate of Hell (1953). He died on November 26, 1974 in Tokyo.
biography.name: Kunitarô Sawamura

biography.bio: Sanae Nakahara was born on July 31, 1935. She was an actress, known for Lady Snowblood (1973), Furueru shita (1980) and Gitaa o motta wataridori (1959). She was married to Kinji Fukasaku. She died on May 15, 2012 in Tokyo, Japan.
biography.name: Sanae Nakahara

biography.bio: Yôko Kosono is an actress, known for Sansho the Bailiff (1954), Flavor of Green Tea Over Rice (1952) and Jiken kisha: Mahiru no kyôfu (1959).
biography.name: Yôko Kosono

biography.bio: Yoshiko Tsubouchi was born in 1915 as Tomiko Yamazaki. She was an actress, known for Late Spring (1949), Histoire d'herbes flottantes (1934) and Le fils unique (1936). She died in 1985.
biography.name: Yoshiko Tsubouchi

biography.bio: Shôichi Ozawa was born on April 6, 1929 in Tokyo, Japan. He was an actor and producer, known for The Pornographers (1966), Black Rain (1989) and La ballade de Narayama (1983). He died on December 10, 2012 in Tokyo.
biography.name: Shôichi Ozawa

biography.bio: Yukihiko Sugi was born on June 12, 1932 in Fukuoka, Japan. He is an actor, known for Kamisaka Shirô no hanzai (1956), Taiheiyo no katsugiboshi (1961) and Gyakukôsen (1956).
biography.name: Yukihiko Sugi

biography.bio: Ikunosuke Koizumi was born on August 26, 1917 in Matsudo, Chiba Prefecture, Japan. He is an actor, known for Carousel Maki; Yoru wa watashi o nurasu (1974), Cupora (1962) and Tokyo Romance Way (1959).
biography.name: Ikunosuke Koizumi

biography.bio: Keiko Hara is an actress, known for Kawachi no ossan no uta (1976), Izuko e (1966) and Kikyô (1964).
biography.name: Keiko Hara

biography.bio: Keiko Ushio is an actress, known for Gyûnyû ya Furankî (1956), Nayoroiwa: Namida no kantôshô (1956) and Inoru hito (1959).
biography.name: Keiko Ushio
